page.title: 13FARMING IN IDE.
page.content: { {West Town Farm.}Andrew & Gordon Bragg farm here,and their family have farmed here since 1912.The farm covers 170 acres over 25 fields.The land is owned by the church commissioners.Nine people live on the farm,4 in the farm house & 5 in 2 cottages.They have 2 other workers.In the summer the brothers work 80 hrs p.w. ,in winter about 40 hrs p.w.They grow their own vegetables but buy the rest of their food supplies in Exeter.They start work at 4.30 a.m. milking the cows.In their spare time they enjoy shooting ,darts & squash.They go to the cattle market in Exeter weekly.They keep cows & sheep and have 2 sheepdogs.They are dairy farmers & keep friesian cows,dorset horn sheep and suffolk rams.They would like to have a bus service pass near the farm.
